Name: SayIt
Description: A desktop app that helps users improve their English-speaking abilities through targeted phrase generation, TTS integration, and voice recognition. Get real-time feedback on pronunciation accuracy using the Levenshtein distance algorithm. Perfect for language learners and those looking to enhance their spoken fluency.

Name: TPF_CTEDyA_COM1_LovisottoSantiago
Description: Trabajo final de la materia CTEDyA UNAJ.
